description:
RACE, SHOOT, EXPLOSIONS, AND MUCH FUN
Inspired by the old-style isometric arcade racing games, OverShoot Battle Race is an extremely fun racing game that brings back the emotion to play a battle racing game alone or with his friends.

TRAVEL AROUND THE GALAXY TO BE THE WINNER
Traveling on another solar system, you will fight for first place in an insane journey through 9 planets facing the most amazing racers in the galaxy.

IMPROVE YOUR VEHICLE
Get new cars, improve your machine, and buy a lot of weapons.

FEEL THE FUN
OverShoot will make bring back the lost feeling, that was playing with friends and family when you have been seated on the couch fighting in the first place and screaming angrily when someone explodes your car.

LOCAL CAMPAIGN WITH SPLIT SCREEN AND ONLINE MULTIPLAYER
Play alone or with his friends and family and have amazing moments with real fun and challenge, but be careful, may you lose your friends.
name: OverShoot Battle Race
